definitions.definition: To tire or make weary by physical or mental exertion .
To wilt a salad by dressing or tossing it.
To lose so much strength or energy that one becomes tired , weary , feeble or exhausted .
To undergo the process of fatigue ; to fail as a result of fatigue.
definitions.label_groups: intransitive , engineering , of a material specimen

definitions.definition: To cause to undergo the process of fatigue .
examples: The repeated pressurization cycles fatigued the airplane's metal skin until it eventually broke up in flight.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To tire or make weary by physical or mental exertion .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , cooking ) To wilt a salad by dressing or tossing it.
( intransitive ) To lose so much strength or energy that one becomes tired , weary , feeble or exhausted .
( intransitive , engineering , of a material specimen ) To undergo the process of fatigue ; to fail as a result of fatigue.
( transitive , engineering ) To cause to undergo the process of fatigue .
